snippet: A federal judge says candidates in a close State House race can contact voters who cast uncounted provisional ballots.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge J Thomas Marten rules that candidates in Kansas' close State House race can contact voters who cast uncounted provisional ballots.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge says candidates in a close State House race can contact voters who cast uncounted provisional ballots.

headline.main: Kansas: Judge Allows Candidates to Contact Voters
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Judge Allows Candidates To Contact Voters
